title: resitdev
author: resitdev
created_time: August 08, 2023, 09:57:55 AMLast edit: August 08, 2023, 10:10:33 AM by resitdev
content: Hello,I want to get a loan of 150 USDT.(TRC 20)TR8pUxw8gKjSqKTpLyew8vjFuXCPxDq4eZLoan terms:45 DaysRETURN:  150%, ie 225 USDTUse of money:  Careful investing in forex using very small lotsize. I will invest my whole 24/7 time and you will invest your USDT. By this way both of us will be benifited. Reason of asking 150 USDT:  I have managed 50 USDT already. But I need another 150, i,e intotal 200 USDT to open a raw account in exness. Request: Please help me and pray for my success. I will try my level best. I can assure you that I am quite patient and confident to win the race for a long run.Thank you in advance

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Less than a month ago you needed a loan of $1000[1]. After getting all the answers you need in that thread and ignoring all of it, you are back with a new loan request and a new reason for needing the loan, also a new repayment interest rate.What is familiar in both cases is you offer no collateral and will not be getting any takers.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5460270.msg62570559#msg62570559- Jay -

comments.author: resitdev
comments.created_time: August 08, 2023, 10:14:10 AMLast edit: August 08, 2023, 10:30:35 AM by resitdev
comments.body: Yes, I saw that nobody is giving me big loan. So I involved myself mining and earned a bit like 50 USDT converting BTC. Also I am a coder. I can code for metatrader indicator. Also have learnt forex quite well. But due to the shortage of fund I am not being able to do forex trading. So, after carefully thinking and calculating I am asking for loan. NB: You mentioned no work which is your misconception. I will invest my full time during this period.

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Without collateral, there is no loan. You could very well leave with the money and not come back, you wouldn't be the first doing that.

comments.author: resitdev
comments.body: Definately not. I am trying to grow myself professionally. Also I will not run with this 150. I menstioned everything in my post that I will invest in forex. If you have idea about raw account and exness, you will see minimum investment is 200 there.

comments.author: condoras
comments.body: Quote from: resitdev on August 08, 2023, 10:44:05 AMDefinately not.Said by who, you? As it said earlier, without valid collateral you won't get a single sat. So either offer something valid or lock your thread.

So I have come to open forum just for help. If you could help me please help, othewise stop commenting. Don't create problem. Try to help others.

comments.author: resitdev
comments.body: LOL QuoteHelp you, no. Help others, yes. And I will stop, no worries! CoolI have doubt if you really helped a single person. Show me any example if you are true. N2.   I have asked for help of 150 USDT.  Now tell me what type of security do you want to get? I definately want to say that you will ask for fee or colleteral. Now tell me - what is the security of this colleteral?Remember one thing. I am in needy. I need 150 USDT. I asked this sum to those person who had much. Say for an example, I have 50 USDT. So 0.00005 USDT is less for me. If anybody ask for this sum to me for help or invest or loan, I can take risk trusting him or her. If required I could investicate his or her investing area practically.Remember another thing - I am not asking loan like you scammer. I remember your name in facebook. It was same who scammed 25 USDT from me. I thing everythng is clear to you.
